parameters.name: BackupId
parameters.description: The ID of the backup file.

parameters.name: BackupJobId
parameters.description: The backup task ID, returned by CreateBackup. If CreateBackup returns multiple BackupJobIds, you need to use this interface to query each of them separately.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. Specify the time in the *yyyy-MM-dd*T*HH:mm*Z format. The time must be in UTC. The end time must be later than the start time.

parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the instance whose backup files you want to query.

parameters.name: NeedAof
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable append-only files (AOFs) persistence. Valid values:

*   **0**: no
*   **1**: yes

>  The default value is **0**.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The page number. The value must be an integer that is greater than **0**. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The maximum number of entries per page. Valid values: 30, 50, 100, 200, and 300.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the *yyyy-MM-dd*T*HH:mm*Z format. The time must be in UTC.
